title: Bug 24779[Perspectives] Reference to invalid views are not removed
description:
Bug 24779[Perspectives] Reference to invalid views are not removed

Observed Behavior (OB): No observed behavior was provided in the bug report.

Expected Behavior (EB): The plugin was not available the last time Eclipse was closed, so the workbench should have no more reference to this plugin.

Steps to Reproduce (SR): No steps to reproduce were provided in the bug report.
